org.smartfrog.services.dns
Class DNSServiceInstanceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.services.dns.DNSServiceInstanceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DNSServiceInstance
public class DNSServiceInstanceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DNSServiceInstance

An implementation of a "bean" that contains info of a service instance.

getWeight

public int getWeight()
Gets the weight associated to this instance. A proportional random factor for equal priority selection (0-65535). (see DNS-SD RFC)

Specified by:
getWeight in interface DNSServiceInstance
Returns:
the weight associated to this instance.

getPriority

public int getPriority()
Gets the priority associated to this instance (lower better). (see DNS-SD RFC)

Specified by:
getPriority in interface DNSServiceInstance
Returns:
